verbs.description: [ARG0: An unapologetic President Donald Trump] [V: defended] [ARG1: his administration 's border - protection policies] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-LOC: in the face of rising national outrage over the forced separation of migrant children from their parents] .
